sqlitedb-desc: An extension to allow MediaWiki to use a SQLite XtraDB Cluster.
config-dbsupport-sqlite: * [https://www.percona.com/software/mysql-database/percona-xtradb-cluster SQLite XtraDB Cluster] is a MySQL-like database cluster.
config-sqlite-engine: The only choice for now is InnoDB
config-sqlite-engine-help: What do you need help with?
